text: Ixora stokesii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to the island Rapa-Iti in French Polynesia. ==References== * Florence, J. 1998. Ixora stokesii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae stokesii Category:Flora of French Polynesia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora stokesii
